title: Difsom Pain Relief 5ML Eye Drops
details: This Medication Is Used To Treat Swelling (Inflammation) Of The Eye After Cataract Surgery. It Is Also Used After Another Type Of Eye Surgery (Corneal Refractive Surgery) To Temporarily Relieve Pain And Sensitivity Of The Eye To Light. Diclofenac Be READ MORE
precautions: Before Using Diclofenac, Tell Your Doctor Or Pharmacist If You Are Allergic To It; Or To Aspirin Or Other Nsaids (Such As Ibuprofen, Celecoxib); Or If You Have Any Other Allergies. This Product May Contain Inactive Ingredients (Such As Polyoxyethylated Castor Oil Found In Some Brands), Which Can Cause Allergic Reactions Or Other Problems. Talk To Your Pharmacist For More Details.
effects: Stinging/Burning Of The Eyes For 1 To 2 Minutes And Temporary Blurred Vision May Occur When You Apply This Medication. Watery Eyes May Also Occur. If Any Of These Effects Persist Or Worsen, Tell Your Doctor Or Pharmacist Promptly.

title: Oclonac 5ML Eye Drops
precautions: Tell your doctor/Pharmacist if you have Cornea problems, Dry eye syndrome, Past eye surgeries.
effects: Eye pain, Decreased vision, Bleeding in the eye (increased redness in the eye) may occur.

precautions: Tell your doctor/Pharmacist if you have Cornea problems, Dry eye syndrome, Past eye surgeries.

title: Ocufen 5ML Eye Drops
details: Flurbiprofen is used to reduce Pain, Swelling, and Joint stiffness from Arthritis.
precautions: Tell your doctor/Pharmacist your medical history, especially of Liver disease, Poorly controlled Diabetes, Stomach/Intestine/Esophagus problems (e.g., Bleeding, Ulcers, Recurring heartburn), Heart disease (e.g., history of heart attack), Stroke, Hypertension, Swelling (Edema, Fluid retention), Anemia, Bleeding or Clotting problems, Asthma, Nasal polyps.
effects: Upset Stomach, Constipation, Diarrhea, Gas, Heartburn, Nausea, Vomiting, Dizziness, Drowsiness,Hypertension or Headache may occur.

title: Veganet 5ML Eye Drops
details: It is a decongestant used to relieve redness in the eyes caused by minor eye irritations (e.g., smog, swimming, dust, or smoke)
precautions: Before using tetrahydrozoline, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to it; or if you have any other allergies. This product may contain inactive ingredients (such as preservatives like benzalkonium chloride), which can cause allergic reactions or other problems. Talk to your pharmacist for more details. Before using this medication, tell your doctor or pharmacist your medical history, especially of glaucoma, heart problems (e.g., heart attack, chest pain), high blood pressure, diabetes, eye infection/injury, overactive thyroid (hyperthyroidism). This drug may cause temporary blurred vision after you apply it. Do not drive, use machinery, or do any activity that requires clear vision until you are sure you can perform such activities safely.
effects: Stinging/redness in the eye, widened pupils, or blurred vision may occur. If any of these effects persist or worsen, tell your doctor or pharmacist promptly.

title: Alcaine 15ML Eye Drops
details:
Alcaine eye drops are available on prescription. It is given to the patients just before the procedure or surgeries related to the eyes. It belongs to the medicine category known as local anesthetics. Local groups of medicine have the same workin

precautions: Following are the alcaine eye drops precautions that should be followed while taking it.Before taking the Alcaine eye drops, you should inform the doctorAbout your medical history.If you are taking some medicine at the same time, that can interact with this medicine.If you are taking any herbal or any other supplements that can affect the usage of alcaine eye drops.If you have any hypersensitivity problems from the ingredients in its formula.If you have an allergic problem, then you should also discuss it with your doctor.Avoid the use of heavy machinery that needs mental alertness.Avoid driving unless you feel clear vision bd your surgery course treatment completes.Store the alcaine eye drops at room temperature and checks the expiry date before taking them.Avoid consuming alcohol unless your surgery treatment completes.It should be used with caution in cardiac patients.It can cause eyes irritation, therefore, do not use contact lenses.Avoid rubbing of eyes.This medicine has been developed for use in the eye only. It is not to be swallowed or injected. The presence of other medical problems may affect the use of this medicine. Make sure you tell your doctor if you have any other medical problems, especially Heart disease,Hyperthyroidism. It is very important to protect your eye from injury while it is still numb. Do not touch or rub the eye. Do not use additional eye drops in the eye until your doctor tells you to. Protect your eye from dust particles, sand, or anything that might cause irritation. Please consult your doctor when taking this medicine if you are pregnant. Ask your physician or pharmacist before taken another medicine.
effects: A doctor will use alcaine eye drops, also considering related side effects. Alcaine eye drops can cause some side effects. title: Catalin 15ML Drops
details: Catalin eye drops contain an active ingredient "Pirenoxine" which is a medication used in the possible treatment and prevention of cataracts.
precautions: Keep it out of the reach of children. Store it below the room temperature i.e. below 25 degrees Celsius. Consult a doctor if you’re hypersensitive to any of its ingredients. Do not take overdose, always take it in a recommended dose.
effects: No side effects are reported yet. However, it may cause adverse reactions in those who are hypersensitive to any of its material.

title: Venac 5ML Eye Drops

precautions: Consult a doctor, if you're hypersensitive to any of its ingredients. Keep out of the reach of children. Protect from direct exposure to sunlight, and heat. Store below the room temperature.

title: Nevanac 0.1% 5ML Eye Drops
details:
Nevanac eyes drops are non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs. These NSAIDs work by inhibiting the release of pain-producing molecules known as prostaglandins. The drops come with the generic name of 'nepafenac ophthalmic.' 

Components
READ MORE
precautions: The precautionary measures are essential to read before using any medication to avoid side effects. nevanac eye drops precautionary measures are described below. Avoid sing nevanac eye drops if you are hypersensitive to them.Do not use the drops if you experience known allergic reactions to any NSAIDs drugs like ibuprofen, naproxen, or diclofenac. Avoid using drops if you are hypersensitive to aspirin or have experienced any reaction using it.It is not recommended to use nevanac eyes drops if you are pregnant or breastfeeding.Do not use the drops and inform your doctor if you bleed easily or have a blood clotting disorder.If you are a diabetic patient, you should not use the medication and inform your doctor.Avoid using nevanac eye drops if you are suffering from rheumatoid arthritis.Notify your doctor if you already have any eye infections.Inform your doctor if you are using any other eye drops.Do not put drops in your eyes while wearing contact lenses.It is not prescribed to use the drops for longer than 2 weeks after surgery.It is not recommended to not drive while using the drops as it may cause blurred vision.Place then medication in a safe place and away from the reach of children. Do not store nevanac eye drops at a temperature above 30 degrees.Tell your doctor/Pharmacist your medical history of, Aspirin-sensitive Asthma or other NSAIDs, bleeding problems, previous eye surgery, Dry eye syndrome, Corneal problem, Diabetes, Rheumatoid arthritis, Nasal polyps.
effects: The potential nevanac eye drops side effects are outlined below. Consult a clinician immediately if you experience prolonged side effects.Eye discomfort. Eye discharge.Dry eyes. Eye redness.Increased sensitivity to light.Problem in vision.Drainage of the eyes.Swollen eyelids.Eye pain.Feeling of dryness in eyes.Headache.Stuffy nose.Vomiting or nausea.Itching in eyes.Exceeded tear production.This medication may temporarily sting or burn your eyes for 1-2 minutes when applied. Eye redness and Headache may also occur.
